summary: mark clattenburg will take charge of the manchester derby on sunday . the english referee sent off vincent kompany for belgium against israel . tyler blackcett and luke shaw have also been sent off for united . clattenburg will be joined by assistants simon beck and jake collin . jonathan moss will serve as the fourth official at old trafford .

aspect: 1. Referee Mark Clattenburg has been named to take charge of the Manchester derby on Sunday despite sending off three players from United and City this season.
2. Clattenburg has been accused of favoring United in the past but has only sent off two players in the Premier League this season and both have been from United.
3. The English referee has courted controversy during his career but is generally regarded as one of the Premier League's leading referees.
4. The Manchester derby between United and City at Old Trafford could ultimately decide who finishes second behind Chelsea.
